entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Princeton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:15 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Princeton Airport 8:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: S 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 7:35 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets and risk of freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. High minus 4. Forecast issued 7:35 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 7:35 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
